q: discussing the budget, Colin Powell said that "the real money[ is] in the entitlements... and unless we do something about those, you can't balance the budget." He added, You can't fix the deficit or the national debt by killing NPR or National Endowment for the Humanities or the Arts. Nice political chatter, but that doesn't do it. n't a matter of winning over the judges. Amateur Night is the ultimate popularity contest. The audience has the power to actually boo artists off the stage at any time during their act.
